page.title: 14Seaton Burn First School
page.content: I like my school because we go swimming and have Sports days. I liked Sports Day. In 1984 the yellows won. On June 9th 1985 for our outing we are going to{Beamish,}the year before that we went to{Warkworth Castle} and we went to the beach. I like going on school trips. On Thursday we play Netball. We have matches against other schools. Sometimes we go to the theatre. When we are doing plays we go to the Drama Centre to practice. Mr Wilson is our teacher; my favourite lesson is Maths. I like Maths; we do it nearly every day.{Seaton Burn First {School}is older than 100 years. We have eight teachers in this school Mrs. Ferguson, Mrs. Greenwood, Mrs. Hester, Mr. Byrne, Mrs. Rees, Mr. Wilson, Mrs Archibald and Mrs. Stobbs. I am not looking forward to going to the Middle School.
